props.name: title
props.description: Sets the title of the slider.

props.name: labelLeft
props.description: Adds the left hand label to the element.

props.name: labelRight
props.description: Adds the right hand label to the element.

props.name: step
props.description: Decides the number of steps for each movement of the slider.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Function to be called when the value state has changed.
